resources.title: The Ultimate Guide to PDR Technology
resources.description: A comprehensive guide explaining Paintless Dent Repair (PDR) technology, its benefits, and how it preserves your vehicle's original finish. Includes FAQs and comparison with traditional repair methods.
resources.author: Pawel Kowalski
chapters: Common Types of Damage Repaired by PDR
Maintaining Your Vehicle's Value with PDR

resources.title: Navigating Hail Damage Insurance Claims
resources.description: An essential guide for vehicle owners and fleet managers on how to effectively manage insurance claims for hail damage. Covers documentation, assessment, and working with repair specialists.
resources.author: Anna Nowak

resources.title: Fleet Vehicle Cosmetic Maintenance Handbook
resources.description: A practical handbook for fleet managers and car dealerships on maintaining the cosmetic condition of their vehicle fleets using PDR and Smart Repair techniques. Focuses on cost-efficiency and value preservation.
resources.author: Tomasz Zielinski
chapters: Smart Repair for Common Fleet Damages
Cost-Benefit Analysis of PDR for Fleets
Setting Up a Proactive Maintenance Schedule

resources.title: PDR Technician Training Insights
resources.description: An overview of the skills, training, and continuous development required to become a certified PDR technician. Highlights the importance of expertise and precision in dent removal.
resources.author: Pawel Kowalski
sections: The Path to Becoming a PDR Expert

webinars.title: Maximizing Profitability: PDR for Car Dealerships
webinars.description: Learn how car dealerships can integrate PDR services to reduce reconditioning costs, speed up inventory turnover, and enhance customer satisfaction.

presenter.name: Pawel Kowalski
presenter.bio: 15+ years experience in advanced PDR and automotive repair.

topics: PDR benefits for new and used car inventory
Cost savings and ROI of in-house PDR

webinars.title: Effective Hail Damage Management for Fleets
webinars.description: A webinar for fleet managers on proactive strategies and efficient repair solutions for vehicles affected by hail, minimizing downtime and financial impact.

presenter.name: Anna Nowak
presenter.bio: 10+ years experience in PDR quality control and insurance claims.

topics: Rapid PDR deployment for large fleets
